DataElement.preferredName: Diagnosis Primary Discharge Diagnosis Data Source Data Value Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The investigation, analysis and recognition of the presence and nature of disease, condition, or injury from expressed signs and symptoms; also, the scientific determination of any kind; the concise results of such an investigation.:The primary condition for which a patient was treated as noted at the time of discharge from the hospital._The person or authoritative body who provided the information._The information contained in a data field. It may represent a numeric quantity, a textual characterization, a date or time measurement, or some other state, depending on the nature of the attribute.:The primary condition for which a patient was treated as noted at the time of discharge from the hospital._Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.
